articles.title: Pavel Zacha scores with 6 seconds left in OT as Bruins beat Senators 3-2 and earn fifth straight victory
articles.description:
Linus Ullmark, the 2023 Vezina Trophy winner with Boston, picked up his first loss against the Bruins since they traded him to the Senators before the 2024-25 season.

articles.title: Report: Mike Vrabel’s former team was ‘unwilling’ to trade with Patriots

articles.title: Jaylen Brown scores 35 points in 26 minutes before watching Celtics coast to 136-107 win over Wizards
articles.description:
